testcase.name: Verify if user is able to sort the results of a product search
testcase.system-out: Given User is on StoreFront homepage with https://uat.buy.hpe.com/fr/fr.....passed When User goes to login page................................................passed And User logins with "isao.palacios.canadaen@yopmail.com" and "Moloko66"....passed And User searches for "DL380"...............................................passed Then Relevance sorting is selected by default...............................passed And User selects sort by name ascending.....................................passed Then Name ascending sorting is displayed....................................passed And User selects sort by name descending....................................passed Then Name descending sorting is displayed...................................passed
